parameters.definition: Wage for senior citizens per week
Wage for young adults per week
Minimum number of workers required per day
Minimum number of young adults required per day
Minimum fraction of young adults relative to senior citizens

description: A store employs senior citizens who earn \param{WageSenior} per week and young adults who earn \param{WageYoung} per week. The store must keep the weekly wage bill below \param{MaxWageBill}. On any day, the store requires at least \param{MinWorkers} workers, of whom at least \param{MinYoung} must be young adults. To ensure the store runs smoothly, the number of young adults should be at least \param{YoungToSeniorRatio} the number of senior citizens. Formulate a LP to minimize the wage bill.
